sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Standardize infrastructure provisioning with Terraform using modules, workspaces, and CI/CD to ensure reproducibility and compliance.

sections.title: Module Design
sections.content: Define reusable modules (networking, compute, databases, observability). Versioned releases with semantic versioning and CHANGELOGs.

sections.title: Environments & State
sections.content: Per-environment workspaces (dev/stage/prod). Remote state in Terraform Cloud/S3 + DynamoDB locking; state access controls.

sections.title: CI/CD & Guardrails
sections.content: Plan/apply via CI with policy-as-code (OPA/Sentinel). Mandatory reviews for prod; drift detection; cost checks.

sections.title: Security & Compliance
sections.content: Least-privilege IAM for pipelines, secrets management, tagging standards, and audit logging of changes.
